custom_css: h1 {font-weight: 500; font-size: 3rem; line-height: 4.4rem; text-align: center; color: #5b5b5f; margin: 0;}
input {border: 0.5px solid #5b5b5f; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 1.4rem; line-height: 2.1rem; color: #5b5b5f; opacity: 0.75; max-width: 443px;}

button {font-weight: 400; max-width: 443px; width: 443px; background: #5b5b5f; border: 0.5px solid #5b5b5f; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 1.8rem; line-height: 2.7rem; color: #ffffff; height: 46px; margin-top: 15px;}
